name: Scrolling Survivor
description:
A classic platformer with a major twist !
In Scrolling Survivor, the scrolling doesn't follow your character. You must stay on-screen until you reach the goal !
Features :

  • 7 long stages and 17 harder sub-stages for more than 3 hours of gameplay, even much more if you aim for 100% completion !
  • Scoring system and leaderboards, for maximum replayability. Will you be the best scroller in the world?
  • Various platforming game mechanics : ride a surfboard, struggle against the wind, escape living hieroglyphs...
  • Original black-and-white graphics !
  • Catchy chiptune music by Arachno !
  • All of this for FREE !
